dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the environmental footprints of wheat from production to consumption
小麦从生产到消费的环境足迹

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Studies were selected when any of the types of environmental footprint namely GHGE, WU, and LU was reported and when the articles and reports were published between 2005 to 2020.
当任何类型的环境足迹（即 GHGE、WU 和 LU）被报告以及文章和报告在 2005 年至 2020 年间发表时，就会选择研究。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: This database contains environmental footprint indicators for GHGE, WU and LU of 17 food groups commonly consumed in China
该数据库包含中国常见的 17 种食品类别的 GHGE、WU 和 LU 环境足迹指标

technology.technologicalApplicability: This database is applied for assessing the environmental footprints of wheat production and consumption in China. It incorporates Life Cycle Assessment data to evaluate the greenhouse gas emissions (GHGE), water usage (WU), and land use (LU) impacts of wheat and other commonly consumed food groups in China. The information may be utilized for environmental impact studies, policy-making, agricultural planning, supply chain management, and sustainability reporting within the Chinese food industry.
该数据库用于评估中国小麦生产和消费的环境足迹。它结合生命周期评估数据来评估小麦和中国其他常见消费食品类别的温室气体排放（GHGE）、用水量（WU）和土地使用（LU）影响。该信息可用于环境影响研究、政策制定、农业规划、供应链管理和中国食品行业的可持续性报告。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The CFLCAD was developed based on a literature review using the China National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI) for journals in Chinese and Google Scholar databases for journals in English. The searching keywords were “LCA” or “life cycle assessment”, “China or Chinese”, “food” and “food name”. Studies were selected when any of the types of environmental footprint namely GHGE, WU, and LU was reported and when the articles and reports were published between 2005 to 2020
CFLCAD 是在对中文期刊的中国知网 (CNKI) 和英文期刊的 Google Scholar 数据库进行文献综述的基础上开发的。搜索关键词为“LCA”或“生命周期评估”、“中国或中国人”、“食品”和“食品名称”。当任何类型的环境足迹（即 GHGE、WU 和 LU）被报告以及文章和报告在 2005 年至 2020 年间发表时，就会选择研究
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: We realized that potential biases exist in studies with different life cycle assessment methods. One study compared LCA studies that used economic-input output (EIO) modelling (top-down studies) to studies that used process-based modelling (bottom-up studies) and showed a strong correlation exists between methodological choices. Furthermore, several studies analyzed impacts on global warming, energy demand and consumptive water use from meat processing of chicken, pork, sheep and beef. They compared LCA methodologies between process based, EIO, and hybrid methodologies, with results generally remaining within a similar range. Therefore, we can accept errors within a certain range through the method of literature review. The literature review strategy is shown in Fig. 1.

我们意识到采用不同生命周期评估方法的研究存在潜在偏差。一项研究将使用经济投入产出 (EIO) 模型（自上而下的研究）的 LCA 研究与使用基于过程的模型（自下而上的研究）的研究进行比较，并表明方法选择之间存在很强的相关性。此外，一些研究分析了鸡肉、猪肉、羊和牛肉的肉类加工对全球变暖、能源需求和消耗水的影响。他们比较了基于流程、EIO 和混合方法之间的 LCA 方法，结果通常保持在相似的范围内。因此，通过文献查阅的方法，我们可以接受一定范围内的误差。文献综述策略如图1所示。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Cai, H. et al. Environmental footprints of Chinese foods and beverages: Literature-based construction of a LCA database. Data in Brief 42, 108244 (2022).
Cai, H. et al. Environmental footprints of Chinese foods and beverages: Literature-based construction of a LCA database. Data in Brief 42, 108244 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should carefully select applicable LCA studies based on the GHGE, WU, and LU indicators for their specific scope within the timeframe of 2005 to 2020. Consideration of methodological differences is crucial; users must be aware of potential biases when comparing LCA results derived from economic-input output (EIO) models and process-based models. Discrepancies between top-down and bottom-up approaches should be acknowledged. While using this database, errors within an acceptable range as per the literature review method can be permitted. Users should also investigate the variations in environmental impact due to different production and processing methods, especially in the context of meat such as chicken, pork, sheep and beef.

用户应根据2005年至2020年间的GHGE、WU和LU指标仔细选择适用的LCA研究，以适应其特定范围。必须考虑方法论差异；用户在比较衍生自经济投入产出（EIO）模型和基于流程的模型的LCA结果时必须意识到潜在偏见。应认知自上而下和自下而上方法之间的差异。在使用此数据库时，可以允许在文献回顾方法中的可接受范围内出现误差。用户还应研究由于不同的生产和加工方法导致的环境影响变化，特别是在鸡肉、猪肉、羊肉和牛肉等肉类的情况。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
